frontmatter.title: Barcelona 2019
frontmatter.venue_address: Fira Barcelona Av. Joan Carles I, 64 08908 L’Hospitalet de Llobregat arcelona, Spain
frontmatter.lead_text: The OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held in Barcelona Spain co-located with CNCF's Kubecon/EU.
frontmatter.info_text: The OpenShift Commons Gathering brings together experts from all over the world to discuss container technologies, best practices for cloud native application developers and the open source software projects that underpin the OpenShift ecosystem. The Barcelona event will gather developers, devops professionals and sysadmins together to explore the next steps in making container technologies successful and secure.

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Collaboration in Action
Case Study: OpenShift at Six Group
Case Study: ML on OpenShift with Nvidia DGX at MOD/Israel
Case Study: OpenShift at X by Orange
Case Study: OpenShift at China Mobile
State of the Operators: Framework, SDKs, and beyond
Operators in Action Panel - moderated by Rob Szumski (Red Hat)
State of Serverless: Knative, Istio, Kiali and OpenShift
What's Next AMA Panel with Red Hat OpenShift Engineers & Product Managers
